titles.title: Transparency for Homeowners Act of 2009
A bill to prohibit yield spread premiums, and for other purposes.
Transparency for Homeowners Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: Transparency for Homeowners Act of 2009 - Prohibits any person from providing, and any mortgage originator from receiving, compensation that is based on or varies with the terms of any home mortgage loan (other than the loan amount).
